name: Macrolides
title: Macrolides
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values includes select antibiotics that are Macrolides.  Including oral and IV formulations.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values includes select antibiotics that are Macrolides.  Including oral and IV formulations.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes that represent Macrolides antibiotics  and any that has the ingredients as Macrolides: azithromycin, clarithromycin, erythromycin, fidaxomicin.),(Exclusion Criteria: Otic, Topical and Ophthalmic formulation. Excludes vetinerary medications: tulathromycin, tylosin.)
